diamond.scene.mesh

Interface Mesh

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMesh, AlphaMapTerrain, BumpyTerrain, Cube, FlatTerrain, MultiColorTerrain, MultiTextureTerrain, Quad, Sphere, Teapot, Terrain, Wavefront
